p_desc: Nextjs Voting Management WebApp with Nodejs API. Added Security features include jsonwebtoken authentication and bcryptjs for password encryption/decryption.
This is an E-Commerce cart System developed using Redux Toolkit and Nextjs with fake products API. I have incorporated a custom polyfill debounce for efficient product search functionality
It is simply a PG booking website built using Bootstrap,PHP,MySQL. Users can search, bookmark, and book PG accommodations in four cities.
Developed Eplacement, a comprehensive placement management website for our college, aimed at streamlining the placement process
It is a Car renting website built using Bootstrap, PHP, MySQL
It is a chrome extension. It is for youtube ad closing.
My Portfolio website built using React,firebase,fetch API
I have used Unsplash API to fetch any search-related image with react
It is simply a Diary of oneself for writing their important moments built using Bootstrap, PHP, MySQL
It is a simple bird shooter game built using javascript, HTML, CSS
